title: ContentDialog locking and placement
body:
ContentDialog is currently far too difficult to use, for two reasons: locking, and placement.
1. Locking. Since only one ContentDialog can be shown at a time, a lock is needed (such as SemaphoreSlim(1,1) or a sequential queue of TaskCompletionSource). In other words, the class is not complete because normal use of it requires wrapping it in additional code.

comments.body: In addition, ShowAsync can only be used if the app is running in the foreground. This means an extra step is required (wait for app to be in the foreground) before using ContentDialog.
